ARABIC: بَدِيعُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَإِذَا قَضَىٰٓ أَمْرًا فَإِنَّمَا يَقُولُ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: the Originator of the heavens and earth. When He decides on something, He just says to it, 'Be!' and it is.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Creator of the heavens and the earth from nothingness, He has only to say when He wills a thing: "Be", and it is.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He is the Creator of the heavens and the earth: when He decrees a thing, He merely says, "Be," and there it is.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: God is the Originator of the heavens and the earth. Whenever He decides to do anything, He just commands it to exist and it comes into existence.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: The Originator of the heavens and the earth – and when He commands a thing, He only says to it, “Be", and it thereupon happens.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: The Originator of the heavens and the earth. When He decrees a matter, He only says to it: "Be! ـ and it is.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Wonderful Originator of the heavens and the earth, and when He decrees an affair, He only says to it, Be, so there it is.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: the Creator of the heavens and the earth; and when He decrees a thing, He but says to it 'Be,' and it is.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: The Originator of the heavens and the earth! When He decreeth a thing, He saith unto it only: Be! and it is.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He is the Originator of the heavens and the earth, and when He decrees something, He says only, "Be!" and it is.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: The Originator of the heavens and the earth; and whensoever He decreeth an affair, He only saith unto it: be; and it becometh.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: the Originator of the heavens and the earth. When He decides on a matter, He just says to it, ‘Be!’ and it is.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: To Him is due the primal origin of the heavens and the earth: When He decreeth a matter, He saith to it: "Be," and it is.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: The Originator of the heavens and the earth. When He decrees a matter, He only says to it: "Be!" - and it is.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Creator of the heavens and the earth! When He decrees a thing, He only says: 'Be' and it is.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Originator of the heavens and the earth. Whenever He decrees a thing, He says to it, “Be,” and it becomes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Originator of the heavens and the earth. When He decrees a matter, He only says to it, "Be," and it is.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [2:117] Creator of the heavens and the earth, making them exist without any exemplary precedent; and when He decrees, wills, a thing, to exist, He but says to it ‘Be’ and it is, that is to say, it becomes (fa-yakūnu: a variant reading has fa-yakūna, on account of it being the response [in the subjunctive mood] to the jussive statement).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (The Originator of the heavens and the earth!) He originated them when they were nothing before. (When He decreeth a thing) when He wants to create a child without a father, like Jesus, (He saith unto it only: Be!) be a child without a father, just like Adam was without a father or mother, (And it is).
